companyDescription: Codetria is a company focused on providing other companies with technological solutions that build bridges between users and services/products, by implementing cutting edge resources available in the market.

rol.title: Developer
rol.description: My responsibility is to deliver products that follow the company's standards, make sure that my coding practrices are always synched with that of the whole team, follow instructions given by leaders, and propose alternative and creative solutions to problems when the how is not clear.

companyDescription: Digital House is a leading tech institute that builds bridges between companies and their tech needs and professionals to fit those needs. It is currently responsible for providing companies such as Mercado Libre, and Globant with professionals with a strong understanding of the latest technologies and development stacks for professional environments.

rol.title: React Instructor
rol.description: My job is to prepare and conduct lessons following a curriculum which is provided by Digital House. Also, I must provide students with feedback on both in-class activities, and class projects.

companyDescription: Digital House is a leading tech institute that builds bridges between companies and their tech needs and professionals to fit those needs. It is currently responsible for providing companies such as Mercado Libre, and Globant with professionals with a strong understanding of the latest technologies and development stacks for professional environments.

rol.title: Creative Engineer
rol.description: Create professional business portfolios for big brands on big events. Some that I can mention now are Heineken, and Coke Cola. These portfolios would include responsive Banners with React-styled-components, intuitive informative landing pages, and promotional responsive E-mails with HTML and conditional content.

rol.title: Developer
rol.description: Create an entire e-commerce for a company called Widemesh. The e-commerce was connected to a AWS API service for data management.

notActiveBcs: I was forced to quit due to a mis-information during the hiring process. I was planning on migrating to Europe; I manifested so during the intervie, and they expressed there would be no problem with it since the job was remote. At the end, I had to travel as planned, and they said it was not possible to work form that far.

companyDescription: Finding the first job is always hard. Companies want people with experience, but then getting that very experience becomes a challenge. I wanted to gain experience to offer, and so I started selling web app e-commerce to local businesses.

rol.title: UI/UX Designer
rol.description: Despite the lack of tools and experience, I was the person in charge of establishing the bridge between the team and the clients. I would collect the clients' ideas, and then, come up with a proposal to suit the clients' needs. Once the green light was given, it'd inform the team and distribute responsibilities.

rol.title: Developer
rol.description: Given we were a small team, I was also a part of the group of developers, and so, I was also given a task.

notActiveBcs: I finally got a formal job.
